title: The Web Dev Game
description: Thie is a Trivial Pursuit Style game with emphasis on adult learners. The questions are web development focused.
used: React, Tailwind, Socket.io, Express, Mongoose, Multiavatar

title: Coding Quiz
description: This was a quick coding quiz using JavaScript.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: This is a weather dashboard to help you find the weather in a searched city.

title: Work Day Scheduler
description: This was a work day scheduler that will keep track of your work day plans.

title: Trivia Trainer
description: This was a joint project that helps train you in trivia. I worked on the javascript of this for the most part.
used: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Trivia API, jQuery

title: Media Munch
description: A project that lets you keep track of the media that you consume. You can search to get information from APIs and add your own reviews/ratings
used: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Tailwind, Different APIs, SQL
